name: GIZZIE - SCULPT TIMELAPSE AS ABSTRACT MORPH
description: Animated timelapse (4k portrait) of the digital sculpting process in the 1/1 painting “GIZZIE PREPARES FOR A DIP IN GUCCI SWIMWEAR ON THE AMALFI COAST”. This short video represents several days of sculpting work, moving from basic blocked-out metashapes to the final form, ready for painting. Model is Gizzie Erskine - @GizziErskine [ T : @guyswily / W : wilyguys.com / I : @wilyguys / H : hic.art/wilyguys ]
